definition: Charles De Gaulle (1890-1970), French general and politician, leader of the Free French during World War II and president of the Republic 1959-1969
to put on or wear (glasses, hat, gloves etc)/to respect/to bear/to support

sentences.english: De Gaulle was, at that time, considered a disloyal soldier.
sentences.chinese: 当时戴高乐被看作是一个不忠实的军人。

sentences.english: She had spent the night at Charles de Gaulle airport.
sentences.chinese: 她被迫在戴高乐机场过夜。

sentences.english: De Gaule stood between France and chaos.
sentences.chinese: 戴高乐阻止了法国的混乱局面。

sentences.english: I myself have become a Gaullist only little by little.
sentences.chinese: 我本身也只是一点一点地才成为一个戴高乐主义者的。

sentences.english: Others in the ruling party accused Sarkozy of betraying his Gaullist heritage.
sentences.chinese: 执政党中还有其他人也指责萨科奇背叛了戴高乐主义。

sentences.english: Paris CDG has 56 departures per week to Brazil.
sentences.chinese: 巴黎戴高乐有56至巴西班次每周。

sentences.english: The policy adopted by U. S. to cope the Gaullism is basically successful.
sentences.chinese: 美国对戴高乐主义的应对政策，基本取得了成功。

sentences.english: He's paying tribute to the Free French Forces under De-Gaulle and Leclerc.
sentences.chinese: 他在向戴高乐与雷克勒克麾下的自由法国军队致敬。

sentences.english: Rio DE janeiro, Brazil take-off aircraft from Charles DE gaulle international airport flight to Paris.
sentences.chinese: 飞机从巴西里约热内卢起飞飞往巴黎戴高乐国际机场。

sentences.english: People hurrahed to de Gaulle for 20 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 人们向戴高乐高呼万岁达20多分钟。

definition: Guiseppe Garibaldi (1807-1882), Italian military commander and politician
Bismarck (name)/Otto von Bismarck (1815-1898), Prussian politician, Minister-President of Prussia 1862-1873, Chancellor of Germany 1871-1890
Dwight D. Eisenhower (1890-1969), US army general and politician, Supreme Allied Commander in Europe during World War II, US President 1953-1961
Benito Mussolini (1883-1945), Italian fascist dictator, "Il Duce", president 1922-1943
Gorbachev/Mikhail Sergeyevich Gorbachev (1931-), last president of the Soviet Union 1991-1995
Yakov Mikhailovich Sverdlov (1885-1919), Bolshevik organizer, ordered the murder of the Tsar's family in 1918, died of Spanish influenza
pinyin: Si1 wei2 er3 de2 luo4 fu1

definition: Roosevelt (name)/Theodore Roosevelt (1858-1919), US President 1901-1909/Franklin D. Roosevelt (1882-1945), US President 1933-1945
Yeltsin (name)/Boris Yeltsin (1931-2007) first post-communist president of Russia 1991-1999
Franco (name)/Generalissimo Francisco Franco Bahamonde (1892-1975), Spanish dictator and head of state 1939-1975
